title: Telex: Iran  (archival materials for the production of the book)
description:
maquette, one of 53 cards for the maquette; archival material for the production of \"Telex: Iran\"; (archival materials include three book maquettes--one of which has 53 cards with mounted photostats--; seven preliminary versions of the cover; one back cover; and seven maquette material pieces)

86.27.1-3 are the book maquettes
(86.27.1.1-53 is the maquette that includes 53 cards with mounted photostats)
86.27.4, .5, .6, .7, .8, .9, .11 are the maquette material pieces
86.27.10, .12, .13, .15, .16, .17, .18 are the cover maquettes
86.27.14 is the back cover maquette
